content: this pattern uses leftover yarn i used some drops air in colour 44 i used a 4 5mm us 7 needle but i think a 5mm us 8 needle would be even better knit for around 1 meter 40 inches and done this project was made as a joke video for my youtube channel 1 you should check it out if you have some time 1 https //youtube com/@braidandtinker si=kwvgeryj1ydc4cwr
